EmailTemplate.subject: XCEL HR (1335885515.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Robert, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. As I mentioned on our call, I think a PEO service would potentially be a good fit for what you are looking for and there is a company we have partnered with, XCEL HR that may be able to help you. Our contact there is David Flook and his phone number is 301.340.3800 ext. 5061 and his email address is david.flook@xcelhr.com. Their website is www.xcelhr.com I have copied David on this email to give him an opportunity to reach out to you directly as well. You will find everything that I referenced on our call by clicking this private link here. Should you have questions for me, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Thank you for your interest in MBO and good luck with everything! Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:david.flook@xcelhr.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
